sources.title: Saloon Bar
sources.description: “Fabulous period piece” “Tight little thriller” “Wonderful ensemble whodunit” “Simply great!” (IMDB reviews quotes). FROM IMDB: “ Against a background of Christmas and the pending arrival of another baby for the landlord, a group of pub locals lead by bookie Gordon Harker  set out to prove that former customer Eddie Graves is not guilty of the murder for which he is due to be hanged in the  morning.” IMDB rating 7.1. Directed by Walter Forde. Released in 1940 (UK only) Complete print

metadata.Plot: Against a background of Christmas and the pending arrival of another baby for the landlord, a group of pub locals lead by bookie Joe Harris set out to prove that former customer Eddie Graves is not guilty of the murder for which he is due to be hanged in the morning.
metadata.Writer: Frank Harvey, Angus MacPhail, John Dighton
metadata.Actors: Gordon Harker, Elizabeth Allan, Mervyn Johns
